com.adidas.ui.dialogs

Class AlertMessageDialogFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • DialogFragment
      • com.adidas.ui.dialogs.AlertMessageDialogFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UiConst

    public class AlertMessageDialogFragment
extends DialogFragment
implements UiConst
    Dialog fragment for alert messages and other modal views. Is configured by AlertMessageDialogFragment.Builder and styles which can use these attributes defined by AlertMessageDialog styleable:
    • primaryButtonBackgroundColor
    • primaryButtonTextColor
    • secondaryButtonBackgroundColor
    • secondaryButtonTextColor
    • messageColor
    • messageBackground
    To define your style for this dialog use alertMessageDialogStyle theme attribute or set styleResId in AlertMessageDialogFragment.Builder.
